external_roslyn:CA2012.example: ValueTask instances should not have their result directly accessed unless the instance has already completed. Unlike Tasks, calling Result or GetAwaiter().GetResult() on a ValueTask is not guaranteed to block until the operation completes. If you can't simply await the instance, consider first checking its IsCompleted property (or asserting it's true if you know that to be the case).
